languages.text: Тела изувечены и выпотрошены. Некогда роскошные одеяния из парчи и шелка полностью пропитались кровью.
The bodies were mutilated and gutted. Once luxurious clothes of brocade and silk are completely saturated with blood.
languages.original_text: Тела изувечены и выпотрошены. Некогда роскошные одеяния из парчи и шелка полностью пропитались кровью.

traits.locale_text: The bodies were mutilated and gutted. Once luxurious clothes of brocade and silk are completely saturated with blood.
The bodies were mutilated and gutted. Once luxurious clothes of brocade and silk are completely saturated with blood.
The bodies were mutilated and gutted. Once luxurious clothes of brocade and silk are completely saturated with blood.
The bodies were mutilated and gutted. Once luxurious clothes of brocade and silk are completely saturated with blood.
The bodies were mutilated and gutted. Once luxurious clothes of brocade and silk are completely saturated with blood.

languages.text: 尸体惨遭肢解，被开膛破肚。由奢华的锦缎与丝绸织成的衣服，已经完全被鲜血浸透了。
languages.original_text: The bodies were mutilated and gutted. Once luxurious clothes of brocade and silk are completely saturated with blood.

traits.locale_text: 尸体惨遭肢解，被开膛破肚。由奢华的锦缎与丝绸织成的衣服，已经完全被鲜血浸透了。

languages.text: Estos cadáveres han sido mutilados y destripados. Sus otrora lujosas indumentarias de seda y brocado están empapadas de sangre.
languages.original_text: The bodies were mutilated and gutted. Once luxurious clothes of brocade and silk are completely saturated with blood.

traits.locale_text: Estos cadáveres han sido mutilados y destripados. Sus otrora lujosas indumentarias de seda y brocado están empapadas de sangre.

languages.text: 死体は切断されて、内蔵はえぐり出されている。かつて錦と絹で仕立ててあった豪華な洋服は、すっかり血に塗れている。
languages.original_text: The bodies were mutilated and gutted. Once luxurious clothes of brocade and silk are completely saturated with blood.

traits.locale_text: 死体は切断されて、内蔵はえぐり出されている。かつて錦と絹で仕立ててあった豪華な洋服は、すっかり血に塗れている。

languages.text: Die Leichen wurden verstümmelt und ausgeweidet. Ihre einstmals luxuriöse Kleidung aus Brokat und Seide ist vollkommen blutverschmiert.
languages.original_text: The bodies were mutilated and gutted. Once luxurious clothes of brocade and silk are completely saturated with blood.

traits.locale_text: Die Leichen wurden verstümmelt und ausgeweidet. Ihre einstmals luxuriöse Kleidung aus Brokat und Seide ist vollkommen blutverschmiert.

languages.text: Les corps ont été mutilés et éviscérés. Les luxueux vêtements de soie et de brocart sont désormais imbibés de sang.
languages.original_text: The bodies were mutilated and gutted. Once luxurious clothes of brocade and silk are completely saturated with blood.

traits.locale_text: Les corps ont été mutilés et éviscérés. Les luxueux vêtements de soie et de brocart sont désormais imbibés de sang.

languages.text: Cesetler yaralarla kaplı, iç organlar da dışarı çıkmış. Eskiden sırmalı ipeklerden yapılma lüks kıyafetler, artık tamamen kana bulanmış.
languages.original_text: The bodies were mutilated and gutted. Once luxurious clothes of brocade and silk are completely saturated with blood.

traits.locale_text: Cesetler yaralarla kaplı, iç organlar da dışarı çıkmış. Eskiden sırmalı ipeklerden yapılma lüks kıyafetler, artık tamamen kana bulanmış.
